data.text: Afei hwɛ, Awurade,
Dɔmmarima ne akofo,
aduonum so panyin ne nea ɔwɔ dibea,
“Mede mmerantewa bɛyɛ wɔn nnwuma so mpanyimfo;
Nnipa bɛhyɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho so,
Ɔbarima beso ne nuanom mu baako mu
Nanso da no ɔbɛteɛ mu se,
Yerusalem retɔ ntintan,
Sɛnea wɔn anim te no di adanse tia wɔn;
Ka kyerɛ atreneefo se ebesi wɔn yiye,
Nnome nka amumɔyɛfo!
Mmabun hyɛ me nkurɔfo so,
Awurade tena ase wɔ nʼasennii.
Awurade bu atɛn
Ase ne dɛn nti na modwerɛw me nkurɔfo
Awurade kasa se,
Enti Awurade bɛma tikuru abegu Sion mmea ti ho.
Da no Awurade beyiyi wɔn afɛfɛde: nkaa, ntamabamma ne kɔnmuade,
asokaa, nkapo ne nkataanim,
Wɔn mmotiri, anan ase ntweaban, nkyekyeremu, nnuhuam ntoa ne nkabere,
nsɔwano mpɛtea ne hwenem nkaa,
ntade atenten pa, nguguso tiaa a enni nsa, ntade yuu ne sika nkotoku;
nhwehwɛ, sirikyi ntade, tinwi so nkaa ne mmati so nguguso.
Nkabɔne besi nea ɛyɛ huam anan mu;
Wo mmarima bɛtotɔ afoa ano,
Sion apon betwa adwo, adi awerɛhow;
